title: LF Silver ADC to duo or silver team
body:
Hello, my name is Lucky or Lachie, I can play most supports, I recently dropped to B1 after a loss streak but getting back into Silver.

My main supports are {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:111}} and I really love to play {{champion:48}} support. (God bless Yellowstar)

replies.body:
MATE LETS GO
adc
Main Vayne, Graves and Corki Main plz

hey man whats your in game name im a silver 3 was silver 1 but dropped cuz loss streak with awesome (sarcasm) team mates haha
about to be promoted to silver 2 though i main adc and or jungle adc mainly i play mainly {{champion:67}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:15}}  but i can play anyone :) been playing since  season 1 but took a year break after season 3 but im ready to get back into it :) with my new oce acc :) since i used to play on NA before OCE existed my IGN is Tarco :) so if your keen just send me a friend :) good luck mate :) and hear from ya sooon :D 

PEACE
